name: Deadlocked (itch)
description:
WebGL can be buggy sometimes (we know about few Safari bugs) - we encourage you to get downloadable version below.

Deadlocked is a old school fps set in a futuristic environment where zombies in astronaut costumes roam around (zombinauts?) some of them on fire!

Promo Gameplay Footage

"64x64 fps aint that bad, its pretty rad!"

Controls:
Movement - W,A,S,D
Shooting - LMB
Switch Weapon - Q,E
Jump - Space

Awesome Music by: Voidbreaker

Twitters:
@khreathor
@ChrisNordgren
@RedeoVulpe
